prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Hudson Valley (venue_uid=hhv-venue)","Location":"city: Saugerties city_uid=saugerties, state:NY state_uid=ny.","GEO context":"lat=41.4153055, lon=-74.2967438 placeid=EjAzNDkgU2FyYWggV2VsbHMgVHJhaWwgIzJjLCBHb3NoZW4sIE5ZIDEwOTI0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCfVXdQaRK8OJERySuqeVcFhNEgIyYw.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-hudson-valley/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-hudson-valley/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "hhv-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "HITS Hudson Valley — Venue Profile (Saugerties, NY)",
  "section_overview": "A big, efficient showgrounds built for volume and mileage. Multiple rings run simultaneously, so plan by ring cluster and keep one eye on in-gate texts. Warm-up rings are spacious but spike ahead of eq and derby classes—set your last oxer after a drag for the truest read. The jog strip is clearly posted near the hunter complex; come tidy, numbers visible, and step off with a forward trot. Vendor row sits along the main spine for quick-run fixes (gloves, studs, spur straps, last-minute braids). Stabling is organized by barns with good aisle width—fans secured, trunks flush, and ring bags staged for fast turnarounds. Footing is modern all-weather with frequent drags and water; expect consistent going from first trip to last. Golf carts help, but the quickest wins come from grouping your schooling by cluster and sending a runner between stabling and the in-gates.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "HITS Hudson Valley",
    "Saugerties",
    "HITS-on-the-Hudson",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "ring flow",
    "A-circuit"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Lock in your HITS Hudson Valley game plan",
  "section_img": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-hudson-valley/",
  "section_img_alt": "Show rings and warm-up at HITS Hudson Valley in Saugerties, NY",
  "section_link": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-hudson-valley/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for HITS Hudson Valley (Saugerties, NY): warm-up timing, jog strip logistics, vendor row essentials, stabling flow, footing notes, and ring-to-ring strategy for A-circuit riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "HITS Hudson Valley — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and footing so you move efficiently all week in Saugerties.",
  "section_search_title": "HITS Hudson Valley Venue Profile — Saugerties, NY",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of HITS Hudson Valley: warm-up strategy, jog strip details, vendor row, stabling, footing, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for HITS Hudson Valley",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up windows: busiest 45 minutes pre-eq and jr/am hunters—book your last oxer right after a drag.",
      "Jog strip: towel, hoof oil, alcohol spray at the ready; numbers front-and-center and a crisp forward trot.",
      "Gate flow: multiple rings move on schedule—sync to in-gate texts and stage two trips ahead.",
      "Footing feel: best once it’s packed—pop a vertical after a few early trips to gauge stride and rebound.",
      "Stabling ops: wide aisles—keep fans secured, trunks flush, and a stocked ring bag by the door.",
      "Routes: use the perimeter lanes to skip cart traffic on vendor row during peak times.",
      "Derby/GP days: plan earlier schooling; warm-ups fill quickly and drag intervals tighten.",
      "Weather watch: sun and breeze swing—stash spare gloves, rag, sunscreen, and a cool towel in your ring kit.",
      "Parking/haul: unload cleanly and move—then group classes by ring cluster to cut back-and-forth.",
      "Vendor row: braiding, studs, spur straps, hole punches—hit it between drags, not at last call.",
      "Team roles: designate a ring runner and a tack runner; one floats at warm-up, one stages at stalls."
    ]
  }
}

prompt-link:
TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Hudson Valley","state_uid":["rechRMPXjOPMcuXJj"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-hudson-valley/","city_uid":["recb7hZOMCjW15NOW"],"placeId":"EjAzNDkgU2FyYWggV2VsbHMgVHJhaWwgIzJjLCBHb3NoZW4sIE5ZIDEwOTI0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCfVXdQaRK8OJERySuqeVcFhNEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"349 Sarah Wells Trl, Goshen, NY 10924","venue_recordId":"recK2eRE6HPTOSiDG"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Hudson Valley","state_uid":["rechRMPXjOPMcuXJj"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-hudson-valley/","city_uid":["recb7hZOMCjW15NOW"],"placeId":"EjAzNDkgU2FyYWggV2VsbHMgVHJhaWwgIzJjLCBHb3NoZW4sIE5ZIDEwOTI0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCfVXdQaRK8OJERySuqeVcFhNEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"349 Sarah Wells Trl, Goshen, NY 10924","venue_recordId":"recK2eRE6HPTOSiDG"}]), Hudson Valley represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 349 Sarah Wells Trl, Goshen, NY 10924, GEO context: lat=41.4153055, lon=-74.2967438 placeid=EjAzNDkgU2FyYWggV2VsbHMgVHJhaWwgIzJjLCBHb3NoZW4sIE5ZIDEwOTI0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCfVXdQaRK8OJERySuqeVcFhNEgIyYw., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
